text: you'll be surprised to know that I'd
like to ask you about the Oscars there
is a big Rao we are now about black
representation for the Oscars what are
your thoughts as now a nominee looking
at those who are surrounding you I
totally agree but it isn't just the
Academy Awards it's the entire American
system is rife with a kind of white
privileged racism that goes into our
justice system what I'm hearing you say
is you still may not go to the Oscars
I'm weighing it yes that's where I'm at
right now
I wake up I woke up in the morning
thinking what is the right way to do
this because if you look at what Mark
Martin Luther King's legacy what he was
saying was the people the good people
who don't act are much worse than the
people the wrongdoers who are purposely
not acting and don't know the right way
